meanings.definition: The land alongside a body of water.
meanings.sent1: We had a picnic on the bankside of the lake.
meanings.sent2: The ducks waddled along the bankside of the pond.
meanings.sent3: The children played by the bankside, pretending to fish.
meanings.sent4: The bankside of the river whispered secrets to the passing boats.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers bloomed along the bankside, creating a beautiful scene.

meanings.sent1: The fishermen gathered on the bankside to catch fish.
meanings.sent2: The bankside was covered in pebbles and shells.
meanings.sent3: The bankside was the perfect spot for a relaxing afternoon nap.
meanings.sent4: The bankside of the ocean sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The birds chirped happily on the bankside, enjoying the peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A location near a river or body of water.
meanings.sent1: Their house was built on the bankside of the river.

meanings.sent3: The cafe on the bankside served delicious pastries and coffee.
